about_the_game:
This collection of battle BGM assets is inspired by classic games of the 2000s, featuring an exciting mix of rock and electronic styles!

The set includes 5 dynamic battle tracks, an epic opening theme, and a captivating ending theme, making a total of 7 tracks. All songs, except for the ending, are designed to loop seamlessly.

*******************************************

Contents

Audio: 7 items

Characteristics of each track:

DLC_BMPCW01: A refreshing rock-style battle track.

DLC_BMPCW02: A rock-style battle track featuring impressive trumpet melodies.

DLC_BMPCW03: A synth-driven battle track.

DLC_BMPCW04: A battle track characterized by heavy guitar sounds.

DLC_BMPCW05: A battle track featuring strings, synths, and a four-on-the-floor kick beat.

DLC_BMPCW06: A bright, rock-style opening track.

DLC_BMPCW07: A somewhat melancholic and relaxed ending track.

*******************************************

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.

This collection of battle BGM assets is inspired by classic games of the 2000s, featuring an exciting mix of rock and electronic styles!

The set includes 5 dynamic battle tracks, an epic opening theme, and a captivating ending theme, making a total of 7 tracks. All songs, except for the ending, are designed to loop seamlessly.
